string.text:
%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]STONE SKIN
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Passive +15% melee damage protection.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Receiving melee damage grants a stack of 'Stone Skin'.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] +15% melee damage protection/-10% movement speed per 'Stone Skin' stack.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Maximum 10 stacks.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] At 10 stacks, +75% melee damage reduction but become completely immobilized.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Effect lasts 10 seconds, after which all stacks are removed.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]DISINTEGRATOR
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] -15% bullet damage received.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Reduced damage is converted to radiation.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]LETYSHOPS TIME
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Receive 4% cashback on every purchase.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]CRITICAL ASCENSI0N
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Passive +10% critical hit damage bonus.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Consecutive hits grant stacks of 'Critical Ascensi0n'.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Each stack of 'Critical Ascensi0n' grants +5% damage to next shot.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Missing a shot removes all stacks and gives psy damage proportional to the amount of stacks removed.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as a shot is not missed.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Unequipping all 'Spike' artefacts will remove stacks without penalty.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]LIGHT OF TRANQUILITY
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Restores health and psy health while near campfires.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Amplifies psy recovery artefacts while near campfires.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Your weapon loses 50% damage output but gains the ability to cause bleeding damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Increases chance for enemies to surrender.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]ZONE ALCHEMY
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Grants the ability to transmutate artefacts.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Artefacts can be upgraded to a better tier or "mutated" to a different artefact of the same tier.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Only Perk/Top-tier artefacts may be mutated.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Each transmutation will consume one 'Bat' artefact.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]SOLAR POWERED
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Grants stat modifiers depending on the current weather:
 %c[d_green] --- %c[pda_white] Clear: Health & Stamina Boost
 %c[d_green] --- %c[pda_white] Partly Clear: Small Stamina Boost
 %c[ui_red] --- %c[pda_white] Other: Stamina Penalty
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]WILL TO LIVE
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Grants health regen while under 25% health.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Effect increases the lower your health.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]WEIGHT OF DEVOTION
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Passive small health and stamina regen.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Members of Sin are granted triple the effect with the addition of psy health regeneration.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Sin companions also receive health regen.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]ARSZI'S BLESSING
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Radiation illness grants a stamina boost and slight radiation removal.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]THE UNORTHODOX WAY OF TRAVELLING\n %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Killing anyone will teleport you to the location of their death.\n %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]DEAL WITH THE DEVIL
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Moving the artefact to the belt will sign the '%c[ui_red]Pact with the Zone%c[pda_white]'.

 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_red] HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO SAVE BEFORE ACTIVATION.

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]INSANITY
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Passive strong psy resistance bonus.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Drains psy health to restore health.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] When health is full, restores psy health.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] There is a chance you will become possessed and perform uncontrollable actions.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] The lower your psy health, the higher the chance and severity of the action.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]ZONE INFUSION
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stepping into anomalies of various types will infuse your active weapon for 3 minutes.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Infused weapon loses 30% damage output but gain 50% elemental damage output according to the anomaly.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] You may drop an artefact directly onto a weapon to destroy the artefact and infuse the weapon with a random effect for 10 minutes.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]CALORIC COAGULATION
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Drains hunger to cure bleeding.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]DODGE THIS
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] 20% chance to reflect 35% of bullet damage recived back to the attacker.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Reflections nullify damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]NECESSARY GLUTTONY
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Provides health bonus on food consumption based on calorie intake.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]CRACK THE JACKPOT
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Upon a lethal headshot on a target, extra money is dropped.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]PHANTOM PACIFIST
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Become completely invisible for 1.5 minutes.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] During invisibility, you may not draw a weapon, talk or 'interact'.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]THE UNLUCKY CHARM
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] 35% chance that incoming bullet damage will be fully redirected to your companion.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] May make some companions suspicious...
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]NIGHT OWL
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Bleeding recovery and movement speed increased from dusk till dawn.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Decreases sleepiness at night but increases sleepiness during the day.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]CHARGER
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Restores batteries while sprinting.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Will not restore dead batteries or devices with no batteries.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]THE NUTCRACKER
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Allows a mighty mutant kick.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]KLEPTOMANIA
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stashes and items give off a dim light.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stashes also emit a signal detectable by an RF-Receiver.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]STUNNER
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Chance to stun mutant if within 2 meters.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Getting hit by a melee attack will stun the attacker for 3 seconds.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] While stunned, the enemy is unable to attack.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Self harm (i.e. fall damage) will result in artefact discharge.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]CULINARY HYPERVERSITY
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Convert energy of raw mutant meat into special abilities.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Lasts for 1 minute. Eating different mutant meat will override the current effect and restart the buff timer.
 
 %c[d_orange]TABLE OF EFFECTS:
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Flesh Meat: 1%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Boar Chop: 25% melee damage reduction.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Dog Meat: Slight bleeding recovery, 1%/sec psy regen.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Pseudodog Meat: 2%/sec psy regen, 25% psy damage reduction.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Bloodsucker Meat: Become invisible until a hostile action is performed, moderate bleeding recovery.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Psysucker Meat: Become invisible until performing a hostile action, 5%/sec psy regen.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Snork Hand: 50% radiation damage reduction, 5%/sec stamina regen, 5msv/sec radiation cure, large hunger decrease.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Chimera Meat: 2%/sec health regen, 10%/sec stamina regen, 33% radiation damage reduction.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Lurker Meat: 33% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] Rodent Meat: 20% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]RAIN OF REVIVAL
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and you are instead revived.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] 50% health is restored, all debuffs are removed and 5 seconds of damage immunity are granted upon revival.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Upon revival, the current weapon is dropped and vision is negatively effected.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]HIGH VOLTAGE
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stepping on an Electra anomaly will recharge batteries and active devices.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stepping on an Electra anomaly also allows infinite sprint for a short period of time.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]BLOODLUST
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Passive +10% melee damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] 3.5% of melee damage is converted to health.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Upon killing certain mutants, there is a chance that raw meat will spawn in the vicinity.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]ULTRA-VIOLENCE
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] 5% chance that shots will be explosive.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] There is a chance that an npc or mutant killed with an explosive shot will also violently explode.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Effect stacks with multiple artefacts (chance of an explosion).
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO
